definitions.definition: A touching, controlling, managing, using, take care of, etc., with the hand or hands, or as with the hands.
The mechanism for handling or manipulating something.
The mode of using the pencil or brush; style of touch.
A criminal offence, the trade in stolen goods.

main_definition: A touching, controlling, managing, using, take care of, etc., with the hand or hands, or as with the hands.
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) The mechanism for handling or manipulating something.
( art ) The mode of using the pencil or brush; style of touch.
A criminal offence, the trade in stolen goods.
